content.text:
# 5th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus

This is a list of members of parliament (MPs) elected to the Assembly of the Republic for the 5th Parliament of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus at the 2003 parliamentary election, which was held on 15 December 2003.
The list below indicates the MPs in the parties in which they were elected.
{| class=wikitable style="border:1px solid #8888aa; background-color:#f7f8ff; padding:0px; font-size:90%;"
|-
! colspan="2"|Party
! Members
! Change
! Proportion
|-
| style="background: #008000" | || Republican Turkish Party || 19 || 13  || 38%
|-
| style="background: #FF7F00" | || National Unity Party || 18 || 6 || 36%
|-
| style="background: #DC241f" | || Democratic Party || 7 || 6 || 14%
|-
| style="background: #0000FF" | || Peace and Democracy Movement || 6 || new || 12%
|-
| colspan="2" | Total || 50 || || 100%
|-
